artist: Engraver: John Corner; Painter: After Niccolo dell 'Abbate
description: half length portrait of man facing left looking out; wearing soft hat, black robe; right hand resting on a ledge; image below ledge in of his painting "Hercules et Achelous"; all enclosed in rectangular frame
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Ipse pinxt   J. Corner inc\'t / GIOVANNI ANTONIO LICINIO / called / IL PORDENONE |  on sheet in pencil: 2-656 / see Licinio
title: Portrait of Giovanni Antonio Licinio
